build.workDir: the directory where to execute the build commande ex /home/CICD/portfolio/Serveur

mouve: commande to copy the built program to the deployment folder ex cp -r /home/CICD/portfolio/Serveur/dist/* /var/www/api.portfolio.com
clearFolder: the folder where the git repo will be cloned to be removed later
repo: Your git repo to Watch here
cron: cron expression ex : * * * * * // program runs every minute
